name: monumentality
title: Monumentality
trigger_description: Own Cothon, Hippodrome and Alexandrian Library monuments at Tier 3.
description: +2 Movement for all Builders and Settlers. May purchase civilian units with Faith... Oh woops, wrong game.

name: pax_deiorum
title: Pax Deiorum
trigger_description: While have Expanded Pantheon modifier, never convert a heretical province and own at least one province of each of the following religions: Totemist, Norse, Fetishist, Nahuatl, Inti, Mayan, Tengri

name: legion_of_couriers
title: A Legion of Couriers
trigger_description: Construct all highways and pathways across Elysium, and have every highway and pathway province in a fort's zone of control.

name: to_make_pytheas_proud
title: To Make Pytheas Proud
trigger_description: Be the first to Circumnavigate the globe and explore every sea tile all before the 1600.

name: just_a_little_exarchise
title: Just a Little Exarchise
trigger_description: Create and have all Exarchates with full territory and less than 50% liberty desire.

name: autokrator
title: Autokrator
trigger_description: Reduce the autonomy in the lands of the former Roman Empire to 0 without ever using Exarchates.

name: the_only_colonizer
title: The Only Colonizer
trigger_description: Lie to Portugal, then, in exactly 1570, have no Europeans present on Elysium.

name: cities_of_the_new_world_desire
title: Cities of the New World's Desire
trigger_description: Ensure Neo Konstantinoupolis reaches 45 development, while also holding 5 cities on Elysium with 30 development and 4 buildings, all before 1500.

name: veni_vidi_vici
title: Veni Vidi Vici
trigger_description: Restore the borders of the Roman Empire at its greatest extend before the Age of Absolutism

name: re_restitutor_orbis
title: Re-Restitutor Orbis
trigger_description: Restore the borders of the Roman Empire at its greatest extend before the Age of Absolutism
